name: Taiko no Tatsujin Wii: Ketteiban
overview: "Taiko no Tatsujin Wii" series The latest work "Taiko no Tatsujin Wii Decision Version" is a "definite version" full of elements that you can enjoy more playing games as it is, with fun and easy-to- And that. If you prepare multiple controllers, you can play 2 to 4 at the same time, even without "drum and bee" you can play with Wii Remote Control, Classic Controller. Also, when you clear certain songs normally, letters come from various popular characters. Although it has already been introduced that mail arrives from "Usavich", it is a place to wonder what kind of characters will appear other than that.
